examples.description: Presents PASAN-CA, utilizing coordinate attention mechanisms and subdomain adaptation for cross-subject fatigue detection.
examples.note: Added for its advanced domain adaptation techniques, enhancing model generalization across subjects. Note: The reference year (2025) suggests this is a future work and might need to be considered for the scope of this review.
